Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sff

This package contains classes for working with 454 or Ion Torrent sff encoded files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SffCommonHeader
    SFFCommonHeader is the header in an sff file that contains information used by all of the flowgrams in the sff file.
    SffFileDataStore
    Marker interface for a DataStore of SffFlowgrams.
    SffFileReadVisitor  
    SffFlowgram
    A Flowgram is a next-generation trace created using pyrosequencing.
    SffParser
    SffParser is an interface that will parse a SFF formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given SffVisitor.
    SffReadData
    SFFReadData contains the raw sequencing data from a given SFF read.
    SffReadHeader
    SffReadHeader contains the information about the a specific flowgram record from an sff encoded file.
    SffVisitor
    SffVisitor is a visitor interface to visit components of a single sff encoded file.
    SffVisitorCallback
    SffVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism for the SffVisitor instance to communicate with the parser that is parsing the sff data.
    SffVisitorCallback.SffVisitorMemento
    SffVisitorMemento is a marker interface that SffParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its sff structure in order to revisit portions of the data.
    SffWriter
    SffWriter is an inteface for writing sff encoded files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Sff454NameUtil
    454 Universal Accession Numbers are generated for each read based on the date of the run, the machine name, the region the read came from and X-Y location of the well.
    Sff454NameUtil.Location
    Location represents the pixel coordinates of a well on the PicoTiterPlate device which contains a DNA fragment being sequenced.
    SffFileDataStoreBuilder
    SffFileDataStoreBuilder is a Builder that can create new instances of SffFileDataStores using data from a given input sff file.
    SffFileParser
    SffFileParser can parse an SFF binary encoded flowgram file.
    SffUtil
    Utility class for working with sff encoded data.
    SffWriterBuilder
    SffWriterBuilder is an Builder that will build an SffWriter implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SffUtil.Linkers
    Mated Sff reads contain both mate data in the same read with a "linker" sequence in between.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sff Description

This package contains classes for working with 454 or Ion Torrent sff encoded files.
